title: "Web forside"

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Dette er min forside.
\
\
Dette er en simpel hjemmeside, der egner sig til at dele materiele (fx kursusmateriale) uden at skulle designe en webside. Hvis man bruger Netlify som server flyttes _site mappen (her er hele websiden opbygget i html) bare over i Netlify.

\
\

### Links
+ [rstudio4edu: R Markdown sites](https://rstudio4edu.github.io/rstudio4edu-book/intro-rmd.html) 
+ [Building an R Markdown website, YouTube tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DfNxk_cKL04) 
+ [Sharing on Short Notice: How to Get Your Materials Online With R Markdown, RStudio tutorial - very useful!](https://www.rstudio.com/resources/webinars/sharing-on-short-notice-how-to-get-your-materials-online-with-r-markdown/) 
+ [Principles & Practice of Data Visualization, Alison Hill = Example R Markdown site](https://apreshill.github.io/data-vis-labs-2018/index.html) 

\
\

### Themes
You have 14 theme options:\
default, cerulean, journal, flatly, darkly, readable, spacelab, united, cosmo, lumen, paper, sandstone, simplex, and yeti (use null for no theme)\
\
You can preview them all [here](https://rstudio4edu.github.io/rstudio4edu-book/rmd-themes.html#rmd-themes).
